EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.S1Tour Post Event - Boston
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending the Boston SpringOne Tour 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for coming out to Boston last week to participate and enhance our community. Looking for slides from SpringOne Tour? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring related here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-tour-boston-q118]]>.
If you’re looking for material from Kenny Bastani’s talks on event sourcing, we’d recommend that you check out these sessions from SpringOne Platform 2017: State or Events, which one should I keep? <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour/state-or-events-which-shall-i-keep-jakub-pilimon-kenny-bastani-3?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-tour-boston-q118]]> Cloud event driven architectures with Spring Cloud Stream <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour/cloud-event-driven-architectures-with-spring-cloud-stream-2-0-oleg-zhurakousky-gary-russell-2?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-tour-boston-q118]]> ...and this Spring Webinar with Jakub Pilimon <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour/sep-28-building-event-driven-systems-with-spring-cloud-stream-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-tour-boston-q118]]>, for a different perspective on Spring Cloud Stream
Please also join us this September 24-27 in Washington, D.C. to network and learn from Spring community leaders. Get $100 off your SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-tour-boston-q118]]>ticket by using the code “Attendee_SpringOneTour_100” when you register!
In the meantime, get started <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-tour-boston-q118]]> with Spring on Cloud Foundry: for free on the public cloud, or on your workstation.
I hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-tour-boston-q118]]>!
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103.
